text: property taxation application to leases communications services purposes amend rsa i b to read as follows b a all leases and other agreements the terms of which provide for the use or occupation by others of real or personal property owned by the state or a county city town school district or village district entered into after july shall provide for the payment of properly assessed real and personal property taxes by the party using or occupying said property no later than the due date b annually on or before april the lessors of all leases and other agreements the terms of which provide for the use or occupation by others of real or personal property owned by the state or a county city town school district or village district including those properties identified under subparagraph d shall provide written notice and a copy of the lease or other agreement to the assessing officials of the municipality in which the property is located this subparagraph does not apply to the department of transportation c on or before april the department of transportation shall provide to the assessing officials of the municipality in which leased property is located a copy of any lease in effect as of january thereafter on an annual basis on or before april the department of transportation shall provide to the assessing officials of the municipality in which leased property is located a copy of any new or renewed lease in effect such lease filing with municipal assessing officials shall not include permits licenses or agreements subparagraph shall not apply to leases of railroad properties which are subject to railroad taxes under the provisions of rsa or which provide revenue to the state a portion of which is distributed to cities and towns pursuant to rsa i a subparagraph shall not apply to leases or other agreements including franchises described in rsa to occupy property owned by the state cities towns school districts or village districts where the personal property placed under or upon such property is a used in whole or in part in the transmission of communications services subject to the tax imposed by rsa and owned by a retailer as that term is defined in rsa x b subject to a franchise described in rsa and the owner of the property placed under or upon such property is subject to a fee described in rsa or c owned by a person subject to tax under rsa regardless of whether the property is taxed as real or personal property under that section any political subdivision of the state may adopt as an exemption from the requirement of subparagraph land leased exclusively for agriculture as defined in rsa all leases and agreements described in subparagraph unless exempted under subparagraphs or or shall include a provision that failure of the lessee to pay the duly assessed personal and real estate taxes when due shall be cause to terminate said lease or agreement by the lessor all such leases and agreements entered into on or after january shall clearly state the lessee s obligations regarding the payment of both current and potential real and personal property taxes and shall also state whether the lessee has an obligation to pay real and personal property taxes on structures or improvements added by the lessee failure of the lease to contain the precise language of this subparagraph shall not affect the occupant s obligation to pay property taxes
